name: BallzOut
description:
Simple, competitive, and absolutely loads of fun, BallzOut is the Ball flinging/smashing game you have been waiting for. It’s a bit like Lawn Bowls, a bit like Air Hockey and a lot like absolute nonsense.

Take it in turns to roll your Ballz into the scoring zone, you can either tactically place your Ballz in an area your opponent cannot reach or attempt to smash their Ballz out of the scoring zone.
